sentences.cn: 凡天然矿物都含有杂质。

sentences.en: Appearance: Yellowish powder, no impurity naked eye can see.
sentences.cn: 外观: 呈淡黄色粉末, 无肉眼可见夹杂物.

sentences.en: Briefly introduces the demolishing mechanism of harmful impurity phosphor in pipeline.
sentences.cn: 简述了有害杂质磷在管道焊缝中的破坏机理.

sentences.en: Chemical products often need control of their trace iron contents as impurity.
sentences.cn: 化工产品大多需控制其痕量杂质铁含量.

sentences.en: Gandrake: We will purge the world of its impurity!
sentences.cn: 我们会净化世界的一切废物!

sentences.en: Moreover, the presence of Ce ~ ( 3 + ) impurity causes the absorption band at 306 nm.
sentences.cn: 同时, 杂质离子 Ce3 +的存在也导致晶体出现306nm的吸收带.

sentences.en: Our oatmeal face mask absorbs impurities from your skin.
sentences.cn: 我们的燕麦面膜能够吸收皮肤上的杂质。

sentences.en: Precision measurement is to content determination and quantification of impurity.
sentences.cn: 含量测定和杂质定量测定应考查方法的精密度.

sentences.en: Reasons of forming first cracks were foundry lacuna, impurity gathering , lard exiting.
sentences.cn: 铸造缺陷 、 杂质元素偏聚和夹杂物的存在是形成早期裂纹源的原因.

sentences.en: Silica, in fact, is a desirable impurity because it is one of the reactants.
sentences.cn: 硅石实际上是一种有用的杂质,因为它是一种反应剂.

sentences.en: The impurity of supposedly pure subcellular fractions is a constant threat to the plant biochemist.
sentences.cn: 以为亚细胞组分很纯而实际不纯的情况,一直是植物化学家感到难办的问题.

sentences.en: The molten sodium corrosivity to aluminium depended on existing impurity, especially silicon.
sentences.cn: 铝合金的腐蚀程度取决于杂质元素尤其是硅的含量.

sentences.en: The oxygen reacts vigorously with the impurity in the iron.
sentences.cn: 氧气与铁中的杂质发生剧烈的化学反应.

sentences.en: This gaseous impurity is able to bring about metal corrosion and contaminating.
sentences.cn: 这些气相杂质的存在会造成金属材料腐蚀,并污染环境.

sentences.en: This impurity must be purged away after death.
sentences.cn: 这种污秽应该在死后加以净化.

sentences.en: This is because of the impurity nitride ( MmNn ) in glass.
sentences.cn: 本文认为这是玻璃内部所含的杂质氮化物 ( MmNn ) 所致.

sentences.en: Vitriolic impurity is contained normally in the sewage that vitriolic factory discharges.
sentences.cn: 硫酸厂排放的污水中通常含有硫酸杂质.

words.tran_cn: 不纯的；肮脏的；道德败坏的

trans.tran_cn: 污点，污染，掺杂，不纯，不道德，罪恶，混杂物，粗劣品
trans.tran_en: a substance of a low quality that is contained in or mixed with something else, making it less pure
